value:
Chrom saved my life. I want to repay
that debt by becoming just like him.

My family's an old and noble one, but
we've fallen on hard times. I hope
I'll be able to rectify that.

I've taken notes on all of Chrom's
battles. I'm sure they'll come in
handy when I give him counsel.

I was only a novice when I joined the
Shepherds to follow Chrom. Here in
Askr, I'm aiming to be so much more!

Don't ask me to sit by while my
friends, my family, and my country
are in danger.

Hello! I'm Ricken. I brought you a gift,
courtesy of $Nf.
I'll protect everyone from now on!
EWWW! Leggo! No noogies!
Hrmm...

This is for me?! Thank you so much!
I won't let you down!

I'm Ricken. I'm a practiced mage—
and before you ask, yes, I'm old
enough to fight.

Hey, do you think there's anything
more I can do to be useful around
here, $Nu?$k$pBeing useful to people is important to
me. That's why I trained so hard back
in Ylisse, so I could help Chrom.$k$pOne thing I noticed pretty quickly,
though...training and combat aren't
even close to the same thing.$k$pI'll admit that when I think about
fighting actual people who actually
want to kill me, my hands still shake.$k$pI can't shy away from that, though.
There are people I want to protect,
and to do that, I have to fight.$k$pSo, I've resolved to make myself
useful—not just to Chrom, but to
you and Askr too.
Who are you calling little?!
I can handle myself!
I'm not giving up!
Don't try to stop me!
But I wanted to grow up…
I'm Ricken! I'll show you my skill with magic!
What? I'm not playing tag with you.
All Chrom does is treat me like a child.
Am I lonely being so far from my family? Hm... Maybe a little.
My dream is to become Chrom's right-hand man and most trusted ally.
Boy, do I need to grow up in a hurry...
I'll grow to be someone you can trust to protect you. Just wait and see!
I've got it!
Um, what do I do?
I can handle this!
